document.full_text: britain's prince william made sure his mother princess diana in his own words didn't "miss out" on the ceremony and celebrations for his wedding to kate middleton in westminster abbey on friday.
document.title: prince william pays tribute to diana at wedding
lines_and_colors: britain's prince william made sure his mother princess diana in his own words didn't "miss out" on the ceremony and celebrations for his wedding to kate middleton in westminster abbey on friday.
